listActiveKnowledgeBases

Collection<KnowledgeBaseDescriptor> listActiveKnowledgeBases()
Get all active stored knowledge bases. The knowledge base is not active while the store process is not finished.

Returns:
knowledge bases

deleteKnowledgeBase

void deleteKnowledgeBase(KnowledgeBaseDescriptor knowledgeBaseDescriptor)
Delete specified knowledge base.

Parameters:
knowledgeBaseDescriptor - specified knowledge base

storeKnowledgeBase

void storeKnowledgeBase(KnowledgeBase knowledgeBase)
Save a new knowledge base or update exist. The update means all element will be removed except RelationType. Those relation types which not represented in the new knowledge base instance will be deactivated.

Parameters:
knowledgeBase - the knowledge base instance

getKnowledgeBase

KnowledgeBaseDescriptor getKnowledgeBase(long id)
Get the knowledge base descriptor of the knowledge base having the specified id.

Parameters:
id - the id of the knowledge base
Returns:
the corresponding knowledge base descriptor

setTopicNameIndexer

void setTopicNameIndexer(TopicNameIndexer topicNameIndexer)
Set topicNameIndexer. This is important object because we search topics with this object and the result topics will be extended.

Parameters:
topicNameIndexer - the topic name indexer instance
